title: New: French For Rabbits – Goat
body:
Hat-tip to the ever fantastic Dance Yourself Clean for putting me onto **French For Rabbits** (that repost feature on Soundcloud works wonders).

Slightly Marling-y in parts, Goat is described by the duo as “a lament on stubbornness and being sorry.” and it certainly feels like a song written by someone constantly blaming themselves for the failings of a relationship. Check out _Goat_ below.
